wikipedia_page.main: Major General Ian Gordon Gill,  (9 November 1919 – 23 November 2006) was a British Army officer who fought with distinction during the Second World War, later serving as Assistant Chief of the General Staff from 1970 to 1972.

response: *Ian Gordon Gill, 86, British army general.Maj-Gen Ian Gill
